description: Save yourself some dollars and make your own Iced Brown Sugar Oat Milk Shaken Espresso at home! This Starbucks copycat recipe is really quick and easy. Prep the brown sugar syrup, keep it in the fridge, and you can whip up a delicious sweet beverage in minutes!
name: Iced Brown Sugar Oat Milk Shaken Espresso
recipeIngredient: 2 shots (2 fl oz / 60 ml) espresso (, or the same amount of very strong brewed coffee)
About 1/4 to 1/2 cup (60 - 120 ml) oat milk (, or enough to top up the glass)

recipeInstructions.text: First make the syrup. Add the brown sugar, water, cinnamon and salt to a small pan. Bring to a boil and simmer, stirring or swirling occasionally, for 10 minutes. Remove from the heat and pour into a small jar or other heat proof lidded container. Use right away or store in the fridge until needed.

video.description: Save yourself some dollars and make your own Iced Brown Sugar Oat Milk Shaken Espresso at home! This delicious Starbucks copycat recipe is really quick and easy. Prep the brown sugar syrup, keep it in the fridge, and you can whip up a delicious sweet beverage in minutes!
video.name: Iced Brown Sugar Oat Milk Shaken Espresso
